objects.text:
• Large Industrial-Grade Cooling Fan
• Durable Weather-Resistant Design
• Heavy-Duty Steel Stand Included
• High-Capacity Ventilation System

product_details.name: Professional-Grade Commercial Air Conditioning Unit with Heavy-Duty Stand | Industrial Cooling Solution
product_details.description:
• Large industrial-grade cooling fan with protective grill
• Durable white powder-coated metal housing for weather resistance
• Heavy-duty steel stand for elevated installation and stability
• High-capacity ventilation system with premium fan motor
• Professional mounting bracket system for secure installation
• Industrial-strength construction ideal for commercial applications
• Space-efficient design with compact footprint
• External condensing unit configuration for optimal performance
• Rust-resistant framework for long-term durability
• Easy-access design for maintenance and servicing
• Suitable for outdoor installation with weatherproof components
• Compatible with standard commercial HVAC systems

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner visually promotes an industrial air cooling unit using a clean and modern layout divided into a four-color quadrant background. The top left quadrant features a bold heading with two text layers: `heading_1` in white and `heading_2` in bright yellow, creating a striking contrast over the dark blue (`#0D4F8B`) background. Below this, `subheading`, `product_name`, and `tagline` provide structured, concise product information using smaller font sizes and a high-tech font style. The tagline (`tagline`) appears in yellow, enhancing visual hierarchy.

The top right quadrant showcases the product image (`product_image`) prominently. On the bottom left, a bulleted feature list (`description`) outlines the key specs of the unit in white text. Below it, a large white price (`price`) stands out, while a yellow rectangular button (`cta_background`) with rounded corners includes the call-to-action text (`cta`) in blue. 

Subtle abstract white geometric line accents and semi-transparent circles add a contemporary tech feel throughout the banner. The layout balances visual weight with practical space for communication.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Blue: #0D4F8B  
- Medium Blue: #136DAD  
- Bright Blue: #1389C1  
- Sky Blue: #20A4E0  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Yellow: #FFD700  
- Light Grey: #E8E8E8
product_color: The product image showcases an industrial cooling unit with a rugged and utilitarian color scheme, ideal for creating a bold and technical advertisement banner. The primary colors include metallic gray (#BFC0C0) from the unit casing, deep black (#1C1C1C) from the fan blades and shadows, and rust brown (#8B5E3C) highlighting wear and tear for authenticity. Subtle steel blue-gray tones (#778899) on the grille and aged white (#EDEDED) around the frame balance the composition. These colors are blended through gradients of metal reflection and age, yet distinctly highlighted by contrast and material texture, emphasizing durability and industrial reliability in the ad.
